sentences.en: A clear moire pattern is obtained only when the model is negligible.
sentences.cn: 仅当模型的双折射效应可以忽略时,才能获得清晰的波纹图案.

sentences.en: His knowledge of English is negligible.
sentences.cn: 他的英语知识少得可怜.

sentences.en: In buying a suit, a difference of ten cents in price is negligible.
sentences.cn: 买一套衣服只差一角钱是无所谓的.

sentences.en: In buying a suit, a difference of ten cents in prices is negligible.
sentences.cn: 买一套衣服价钱只差一角钱是无所谓的.

sentences.en: The company says the cost of relocation will be negligible.
sentences.cn: 公司称搬迁的费用可以忽略不计。

sentences.en: The damage done to his property was negligible.
sentences.cn: 对他财产造成的损失微不足道。

sentences.en: The damage to my car is negligible.
sentences.cn: 我的汽车的损坏程度可忽略不计.

sentences.en: The difference between your wages and mine is negligible.
sentences.cn: 你的工资和我的工资差别很小.

sentences.en: The pay that the soldiers received was negligible.
sentences.cn: 士兵拿到的军饷少得可怜。

sentences.en: The practical inconveniences of long hair are negligible.
sentences.cn: 长发在实际生活中产生的不便可以忽略不计。

sentences.en: There is a negligible difference in meaning between these two words.
sentences.cn: 这两个词之间在意义上差别是极小的.

sentences.en: There was a negligible amount of rain in that region last year.
sentences.cn: 去年在那个地区只有轻微的雨量.

sentences.en: These effects appear to be negligible with respect to aerodynamic coefficients.
sentences.cn: 就空气动力系数这方面来说,这些影响似乎可以略去.

sentences.en: Though the money was negligible, the consideration behind it warmed his heart.
sentences.cn: 这点钱不算什么,可是使他觉到一种人情, 一种体谅,使人心中痛快.

words.tran_cn: 疏忽的；忽略的；不小心的
微不足道的，[数]可以忽略的

trans.tran_cn: 可以忽略的，微不足道的，无足轻重的，不足轻重
trans.tran_en: too slight or unimportant to have any effect
